prompts: Create a bipedal fire-type Pokemon with bright orange fur and a confident expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that is both cute and tough, featuring orange and black colors with a fiery spirit.
Show me a middle-stage evolution Pokemon that embodies strength and warmth, with a round body and a playful demeanor.
Generate a character design for a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions, showcasing its fiery nature.
Design a Pokemon that combines fiery orange with hints of black, emphasizing its fighting capabilities.
Give me a visual concept of a Pokemon that stands out in a forest, with bold colors and unique features.
Make a vibrant Pokemon character that represents both fire and fighting types, radiating energy and confidence.
